v/a - Loathed Sound Dept Mixtape Series
v/a - Loathed Sound Dept Mixtape Series - Drift: A Mix From Ian Kim Judd

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on September 25, 2020 Description from Terminal Escape:
 One of the earlier offerings from Loathed Sound, a sixty minute collection of proto-New Age and ambient sounds from the likes of PABLO'S EYE, SYLVIA MEYER, DANIEL SCHMIDT, INOYAMA LAND, AKIRA ITO and several others, mixed and presented by Ian Kim Judd. Suitable for reflection, relaxation, introspection or pure escape - all of which are more necessary now than at any time in recent memory. DRIFT
